scripts.build: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env buildType=ee,SQLE,PROVISION vite build
scripts.build:ce:sqle: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env buildType=ce,SQLE vite build
scripts.build:ee:sqle: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env buildType=ee,SQLE vite build
scripts.build:provision: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env buildType=ee,PROVISION vite build
